S

saveListToTextFile(Object[], String) - Static method in class groupLUXURY.util.ListUtilities
General method to save the string representation of an array containing any type of object into a sequential text file.
separateItems(String) - Static method in class groupLUXURY.hotel.data.HotelFileLoader
Separates the string representation of a customer into separate string representations of all its data members.
sort(Comparable[]) - Static method in class groupLUXURY.util.ListUtilities
Sorts a list of objects in ascending natural order using * selection sort.
sort(Comparable[], Comparator) - Static method in class groupLUXURY.util.ListUtilities
Sorts a list of objects in the given order.
SortMergeApp - Class in groupLUXURY.hotel.data
Loads and sort the room text file.
SortMergeApp() - Constructor for class groupLUXURY.hotel.data.SortMergeApp
 
sortMergeCustomerList() - Static method in class groupLUXURY.hotel.data.SortMergeApp
Loads, merges and sorts all the customer sequential text files into a single Customer[], saves the string representation of the resulting Customer[] into a sequential text file.
sortMergeReservationList(Customer[], Room[]) - Static method in class groupLUXURY.hotel.data.SortMergeApp
Loads, merges and sorts all the reservation sequential text files into a single Reservation[], saves the string representation of the resulting Reservation[] into a sequential text file.
